svg.text: transfer ownership to Factory ( call transferOwnership() )

text.style: font-family: "trebuchet ms", verdana, arial; font-size: 16px; font-weight: 400;

svg.text: set MACI parameters if necessary ( call setMaciParameters() )

text.style: font-family: "trebuchet ms", verdana, arial; font-size: 16px; font-weight: 400;
font-family: "trebuchet ms", verdana, arial; font-size: 16px; font-weight: 400;
font-family: "trebuchet ms", verdana, arial; font-size: 16px; font-weight: 400;

svg.text: donate to the matching pool ( call contributeMatchingFunds() )

text.style: font-family: "trebuchet ms", verdana, arial; font-size: 16px; font-weight: 400;

text.tspan: contributor registers with their verified address (using BrightID)

text.style: font-family: "trebuchet ms", verdana, arial; font-size: 16px; font-weight: 400;

svg.text: donate to the pool ( call contribute() )

text.style: font-family: "trebuchet ms", verdana, arial; font-size: 16px; font-weight: 400;

text.tspan: coordinator tallies the votes and generates proofs

text.style: font-family: "trebuchet ms", verdana, arial; font-size: 16px; font-weight: 400;

svg.text: prove the correctness of vote tally ( call proveVoteTallyBatch() )

text.style: font-family: "trebuchet ms", verdana, arial; font-size: 14px; font-weight: 400;
text.tspan: coordinator uploads the tally to IPFS

text.style: font-family: "trebuchet ms", verdana, arial; font-size: 16px; font-weight: 400;
font-family: "trebuchet ms", verdana, arial; font-size: 14px; font-weight: 400;
font-family: "trebuchet ms", verdana, arial; font-size: 16px; font-weight: 400;
font-family: "trebuchet ms", verdana, arial; font-size: 16px; font-weight: 400;

svg.text: transfer matching funds and finalize the round

text.style: font-family: "trebuchet ms", verdana, arial; font-size: 16px; font-weight: 400;

svg.text: verify the total amount of spent voice credits ( call verifySpentVoiceCredits() )

text.style: font-family: "trebuchet ms", verdana, arial; font-size: 16px; font-weight: 400;
font-family: "trebuchet ms", verdana, arial; font-size: 14px; font-weight: 400;
text.tspan: round can not be cancelled anymore

text.style: font-family: "trebuchet ms", verdana, arial; font-size: 16px; font-weight: 400;

svg.text: submit vote tally, amount of spent voice credits and proofs ( call claimFunds() )

text.style: font-family: "trebuchet ms", verdana, arial; font-size: 16px; font-weight: 400;

svg.text: find the corresponding vote option index
